choose.when: SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL

SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL

SELECT MSG_ID AS msgid, 'PH' AS messagetype, MSG AS msg, MSG AS msgsms, PHN AS phn, P_INVOICE as pinvoice, SMS_SENDER AS smssender, SMSLMS_TIT AS smslmstit, SMS_KIND AS smskind, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regdt, NVL(RESERVE_DT, '00000000000000') AS reservedt from ${msg_table} where STATUS = '1' and SEND_GROUP = #{group_no} and SMS_KIND = #{msg_type}

SELECT MSG_ID AS msgid, 'PH' AS messagetype, MSG AS msg, MSG AS msgsms, PHN AS phn, P_INVOICE as pinvoice, SMS_SENDER AS smssender, SMSLMS_TIT AS smslmstit, SMS_KIND AS smskind, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regdt, IFNULL(RESERVE_DT, '00000000000000') AS reservedt from ${msg_table} where STATUS = '1' and SEND_GROUP = #{group_no} and SMS_KIND = #{msg_type}
UPDATE ${msg_table} SET STATUS = '${status}', RESULT_DT = '${result_dt}', RESULT = '${code}', TELCOINFO = '${telecom}', REAL_MESSAGE_TYPE = '${real_send_type}' WHERE MSG_ID = '${msgid}'
UPDATE ${msg_table} SET STATUS = '${status}', RESULT_DT = '${result_dt}', RESULT = '${code}', TELCOINFO = '${telecom}', REAL_MESSAGE_TYPE = '${real_send_type}' WHERE MSG_ID = '${msgid}'
DELETE FROM ${msg_table} WHERE MSG_ID = #{msgid}
DELETE FROM ${msg_table} WHERE MSG_ID = #{msgid}
DELETE FROM ${msg_table} WHERE SEND_GROUP = #{group_no}
DELETE FROM ${msg_table} WHERE SEND_GROUP = #{group_no}

SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE1 IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE2 IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE3 IS NULL

SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE1 IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE2 IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE3 IS NULL

UPDATE ${msg_table} SET STATUS = '1', SEND_GROUP = #{group_no} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE1 IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE2 IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE3 IS NULL AND ROWNUM <= 500

UPDATE ${msg_table} SET STATUS = '1', SEND_GROUP = #{group_no} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE1 IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE2 IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE3 IS NULL LIMIT 500

SELECT MSG_ID AS msgid, 'PH' AS messagetype, MSG AS msg, MSG AS msgsms, PHN AS phn, P_INVOICE as pinvoice, SMS_SENDER AS smssender, SMSLMS_TIT AS smslmstit, 'L' AS smskind, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regdt, NVL(RESERVE_DT, '00000000000000') AS reservedt from ${msg_table} where STATUS = '1' and SEND_GROUP = #{group_no} and SMS_KIND = #{msg_type}

SELECT MSG_ID AS msgid, 'PH' AS messagetype, MSG AS msg, MSG AS msgsms, PHN AS phn, P_INVOICE as pinvoice, SMS_SENDER AS smssender, SMSLMS_TIT AS smslmstit, 'L' AS smskind, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regdt, IFNULL(RESERVE_DT, '00000000000000') AS reservedt from ${msg_table} where STATUS = '1' and SEND_GROUP = #{group_no} and SMS_KIND = #{msg_type}

SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE_KEY IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND MMS_IMAGE_KEY IS NOT NULL

SELECT MSG_ID AS msgid, 'PH' AS messagetype, MSG AS msg, MSG AS msgsms, PHN AS phn, P_INVOICE as pinvoice, SMS_SENDER AS smssender, SMSLMS_TIT AS smslmstit, 'M' AS smskind, MMS_IMAGE_KEY AS mms_image_id, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regdt, NVL(RESERVE_DT, '00000000000000') AS reservedt from ${msg_table} where STATUS = '1' and SEND_GROUP = #{group_no} and SMS_KIND = #{msg_type}

SELECT MSG_ID AS msgid, 'PH' AS messagetype, MSG AS msg, MSG AS msgsms, PHN AS phn, P_INVOICE as pinvoice, SMS_SENDER AS smssender, SMSLMS_TIT AS smslmstit, 'M' AS smskind, MMS_IMAGE_KEY AS mmsimageid, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regdt, IFNULL(RESERVE_DT, '00000000000000') AS reservedt from ${msg_table} where STATUS = '1' and SEND_GROUP = #{group_no} and SMS_KIND = #{msg_type}

SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND MMS_IMAGE_KEY IS NULL AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND (MMS_IMAGE1 IS NOT NULL or MMS_IMAGE2 IS NOT NULL or MMS_IMAGE3 IS NOT NULL)

SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) AND MMS_IMAGE_KEY IS NULL AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND (MMS_IMAGE1 IS NOT NULL or MMS_IMAGE2 IS NOT NULL or MMS_IMAGE3 IS NOT NULL)

SELECT MSG_ID AS msgid, MMS_IMAGE1 AS file1, MMS_IMAGE2 AS file2, MMS_IMAGE3 AS file3 FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND MMS_IMAGE_KEY IS NULL AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND (MMS_IMAGE1 IS NOT NULL or MMS_IMAGE2 IS NOT NULL or MMS_IMAGE3 IS NOT NULL)

SELECT MSG_ID AS msgid, MMS_IMAGE1 AS file1, MMS_IMAGE2 AS file2, MMS_IMAGE3 AS file3 FROM ${msg_table} WHERE STATUS = '0' AND (RESERVE_DT = '00000000000000' OR RESERVE_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) AND MMS_IMAGE_KEY IS NULL AND RESPONSE_DT IS NULL AND SMS_KIND = #{msg_type} AND SEND_GROUP IS NULL AND (MMS_IMAGE1 IS NOT NULL or MMS_IMAGE2 IS NOT NULL or MMS_IMAGE3 IS NOT NULL)
DELETE FROM ${msg_table} WHERE MSG_ID = #{msgid}
DELETE FROM ${msg_table} WHERE MSG_ID = #{msgid}
